languages.text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Однако, судя по его любезности с юным Зауэрбэком, он явно желает укрепить свои отношения с этим домом. Старших Зауэрбэка и Гапрака нигде не видно, что может значить лишь одно — Зауэрбэк, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Однако, судя по его любезности с юным Зауэрбеком, он явно желает укрепить свои отношения с этим домом. Старшие Зауэрбек и Гапрак шепчутся в другом углу — Зауэрбек, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Старших Зауэрбэка и Гапрака нигде не видно, что может значить лишь одно — Зауэрбэк, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムがダルゴナス貴族の指導者の地位を保っているのは明らかだ。だが、ヤング・ザウアーバックに礼儀正しく接していることから、ザウアーバック家と深い関係を築きたい思惑が見える。シニア・ザウアーバックとギャプラックは別の場所で小声で話をしている。ザウアーバックの一族はあなたに対してよそよそしい態度をとっているようなので、ギャプラックを引き込んでおこうとしているに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムがダルゴナス貴族の指導者の地位を保っているのは明らかだ。だが、ヤング・ザウアーバックに礼儀正しく接していることから、ザウアーバック家と深い関係を築きたい思惑が見える。シニア・ザウアーバックとギャプラックは別の場所で小声で話をしている。ザウアーバックの一族はあなたに対してよそよそしい態度をとっているようなので、ギャプラックを引き込んでおこうとしているに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔依然是达戈努斯贵族阶级的领袖。不过，从他对待年轻的苏尔贝克的态度来看，他显然想加强与这个家族的关系。年长的苏尔贝克和贾帕克不知去向，这只能说明一件事情——苏尔贝克家族完全没把你放在眼里。此刻，老苏尔贝克肯定打算把贾帕克家族拉到他的阵营中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔依然是达戈努斯贵族阶级的领袖。不过，从他对待年轻的苏尔贝克的态度来看，他显然想加强与这个家族的关系。年长的苏尔贝克和贾帕克不知去向，这只能说明一件事情——苏尔贝克家族完全没把你放在眼里。此刻，老苏尔贝克肯定打算把贾帕克家族拉到他的阵营中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Claramente, Drivestem sigue siendo el líder de los aristócratas de Dargonus, pero a juzgar por la cortesía con la que trata al joven Sauerback tiene intención de reforzar sus lazos con dicha casa. Los ancianos de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak están ausentes, lo que solo puede significar una cosa. Sauerback, que parece no tenerte en mucha estima, debe de estar intentando convencer a Gaprak para que le apoye.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Claramente, Drivestem sigue siendo el líder de los aristócratas de Dargonus, pero a juzgar por la cortesía con la que trata al joven Sauerback tiene intención de reforzar sus lazos con dicha casa. Los ancianos de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak están ausentes, lo que solo puede significar una cosa. Sauerback, que parece no tenerte en mucha estima, debe de estar intentando convencer a Gaprak para que le apoye.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Manifestement, Drivestem est toujours la figure de proue de l'aristocratie de Dargonus. L'extrême courtoisie dont il fait preuve envers le jeune Sauerback laisse néanmoins présager qu'il cherche à renforcer ses liens avec cette maison qui semble pourtant décidée à vous snober. L'aîné des Sauerback et la représentante des Gaprak, quant à eux, se sont éclipsés, ce qui ne peut signifier qu'une chose : le premier, dont la famille ne vous apprécie guère, tente certainement de gagner la seconde à sa cause.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Manifestement, Drivestem est toujours la figure de proue de l'aristocratie de Dargonus. L'extrême courtoisie dont il fait preuve envers le jeune Sauerback laisse néanmoins présager qu'il cherche à renforcer ses liens avec cette maison qui semble pourtant décidée à vous snober. L'aîné des Sauerback et la représentante des Gaprak, quant à eux, se sont éclipsés, ce qui ne peut signifier qu'une chose : le premier, dont la famille ne vous apprécie guère, tente certainement de gagner la seconde à sa cause.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem ist offensichtlich nach wie vor der Anführer des Adels von Dargonus. Aber angesichts seines höflichen Umgangs mit dem jungen Sauerback scheint er eindeutig seine Verbindung mit diesem Haus stärken zu wollen. Keine Spur vom älteren Sauerback und Gaprak. Das kann nur eines bedeuten: Sauerback, dessen Linie nicht viel von Euch hält, wird sicher versuchen, Gaprak auf seine Seite zu ziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem ist offensichtlich nach wie vor der Anführer des Adels von Dargonus. Aber angesichts seines höflichen Umgangs mit dem jungen Sauerback scheint er eindeutig seine Verbindung mit diesem Haus stärken zu wollen. Keine Spur vom älteren Sauerback und Gaprak. Das kann nur eines bedeuten: Sauerback, dessen Linie nicht viel von Euch hält, wird sicher versuchen, Gaprak auf seine Seite zu ziehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem, elbette Dargonus aristokrasisinin lideri olarak konumunu koruyor. Öte yandan valinin genç Sauerback'e gösterdiği nezakete bakıldığında, o haneyle olan ilişkisini sağlama almak istediği göze çarpıyor. İhtiyar Sauerback ve Gaprak ortalarda görünmüyor, bu da tek bir şey anlamına gelebilir... Soyunu önemsemeyen Sauerback, Gaprak'ı da safına çekmeye çalışıyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The elder Sauerback and Gaprak are nowhere to be seen, which can mean only one thing: Sauerback, whose line holds you in little regard, is surely attempting to draw Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem, elbette Dargonus aristokrasisinin lideri olarak konumunu koruyor. Öte yandan valinin genç Sauerback'e gösterdiği nezakete bakıldığında, o haneyle olan ilişkisini sağlama almak istediği göze çarpıyor.
